channel.title: Md on Dental Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Md on Dental Data Science

item.title: New post in markdown
item.author: sergio.uribe@gmail.com (Sergio Uribe)
item.description: Packages install.packages(“pubh”) install.packages(“tidyverse”) install.packages(“pubh”) Exploratory data analysis of medical data library(pubh) library(tidyverse) Dataset data(Hodgkin) Exploring the raw dataset head(Hodgkin) Summary tables Hodgkin %>% gather(key = "Cell", value = value, CD4:CD8) %>% group_by(Group, Cell) %>% summarise(Mean = mean(value)) %>% spread(Cell, Mean) Visualizations Histogram Hodgkin %>% mutate("CD4/CD8 ratio" = CD4 / CD8) %>% ggplot(aes(x = `CD4/CD8 ratio`, fill = Group)) + geom_histogram(bins = 9, alpha = 0.5) + theme_minimal() + scale_fill_grey() Boxplot with summary table Hodgkin %>% mutate("CD4/CD8 ratio" = CD4 / CD8) %>% group_by(Group) %>% summarise(N = n(), "Min.
